    Handles game logic and brings everything together

    James Taracevicz

      • playerCombatTurn

        public boolean playerCombatTurn()
        Do all actions involved in player's turn while in combat
        Returns:
        true if enemy has been killed or player has escaped, false otherwise

      • enemyCombatTurn

        public boolean enemyCombatTurn()
        Do all actions involved in enemy's turn during combat
        Returns:
        true if player was defeated or the enemy ran away (due to lack of ammo, false otherwise

      • pickGun

        public Gun pickGun()
        Use UI method UI.getGunChoice() to prompt user to select a gun then create a gun object based on String of what user chose
        Returns:
        gun object created

      • pickRandomGunForEnemy

        public Gun pickRandomGunForEnemy()
        Randomly pick a gun; Enemy.equipRandomGun() also does something similar
        Returns:
        the gun object picked

      • enemyEncountered

        public boolean enemyEncountered()
        Returns:
        true if enemy has been encountered false otherwise

        System sleeps for given amount of time
